issues.message: Remove this conditional structure or edit its code blocks so that they're not all the same.
Define a constant instead of duplicating this literal "Error: close file from %s, %s" 3 times.
Add either an 'id' or a 'scope' attribute to this <th> tag.
Refactor this method to reduce its Cognitive Complexity from 21 to the 15 allowed.
